H0.text: Which is the only country on mainland Europe to be in the same time zone as the UK. Portugal

H1.text: Which is the only country on mainland Europe to be in the same time zone as the UK. Ireland

H2.text: Which is the only country on mainland Europe to be in the same time zone as the UK. Spain

H3.text: Which is the only country on mainland Europe to be in the same time zone as the UK. Potiti

A4.text: Ireland adopted GMT by the Time (Ireland) Act 1916 (6 & 7 Geo. 5. c. 45), supplanting Dublin Mean Time.

A5.text: The Republic has followed the UK.
